          <title>
            <string language="ca">A World of Dreams</string>
            <string language="en">A World of Dreams</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Welt von Träumen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un monde des rêves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um mundo dos sonhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un mondo dei sogni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας κόσμος των ονείρων</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">En aquesta pàgina web la professora Anna Aznar proposa activitats per aprendre anglès basades en el món del cinema.</string>
            <string language="en">On this webpage, the teacher Anna Aznar suggests English learning activities based on the world of cinema.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ensenyament dels mitjans de comunicació</string>
            <string language="en">media education</string>
            <string language="es">enseñanza de los medios de comunicación</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auf dieser Webseite schlägt der Lehrer Anna 
Aznar die englischen Lernenaktivitäten vor, die auf der Welt des 
Kinos basieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sur cette page Web, le professeur Anna 
Aznar suggère l'étude anglaise basée sur le monde du cinéma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste Web page, o professor Anna Aznar sugere as 
atividades de aprendizagem inglesas baseadas no mundo do cinema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Su questo Web page, l'insegnante Anna Aznar 
suggerisce le attività imparanti inglesi basate sul mondo del 
cinematografo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το webpage, ο δάσκαλος Anna Aznar 
προτείνει τις αγγλικές δραστηριότητες εκμάθησης βασισμένες στον 
κόσμο του κινηματογράφου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mediaausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de medias</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução dos media</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di media</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μέσων</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
